name: src/index.js
Disposable
description: Represents a state of disposition and activation.

name: create
description: Creates a Disposable instance.

name: disposed
description: Returns true if the Disposable is disposed.

name: active
description: Returns true if the Disposable is active.

name: enable
description:
Enables a Disposable.

Fails to enable if the Disposable instance is
already disposed.

name: disable
description:
Disables a Disposable.

Fails to disable if the Disposable instance is
already disposed.

name: isParentTo
description: Checks if this Disposable is a parent of the given Disposable (hierarchy).

name: setParent
description:
Sets the given Disposable as a parent Disposable.

if the given Disposable is already disposed, this
Disposable is disposed as well.

name: removeParent
description: Removes the parent Disposable

name: add
description:
Adds a Disposable as a child Disposable.

Child Disposables are disposed, enabled and disabled if their
parent Disposable is disposed as well.

A child Disposable cannot have more than one parent Disposable.

If a child Disposable is added to a parent Disposable that is
already disposed, the child Disposable is disposed.

name: remove
description: Removes a direct child Disposable.

params.name: disposable
params.description: The child Disposable to be removed.

name: dispose
description:
Disposes the instance.

If the Disposable instance has more than one children, the
child Disposables are disposed as well.

name: addEventListener
description: Registers a listener function to a target event dispatcher.

params.name: ev
params.description:
Defines the event target
- enable: fires whenever the Disposable is enabled.
- disable: fires whenever the Disposable is disabled.
- dispose: fires when the Disposable is disposed.

params.name: fn
params.description: a function to be called when the event is dispatched.

name: removeEventListener
description: Removes a listener function from a target event dispatcher.

params.name: ev
params.description:
Defines the event target
- enable: fires whenever the Disposable is enabled.
- disable: fires whenever the Disposable is disabled.
- dispose: fires when the Disposable is disposed.

params.name: fn
params.description: a function from be removed from the target event dispatcher.

content:
# rx-disposable
Reactive Extensions - represents a state of disposition

# rx-disposable

Reactive Extensions - represents a deferred computation with an indication for a disposable value or exception.

[![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/rx-disposable.png)](https://nodei.co/npm/rx-disposable/)

[![](https://data.jsdelivr.com/v1/package/npm/rx-disposable/badge)](https://www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/rx-disposable)
[![HitCount](http://hits.dwyl.io/lxsmnsyc/rx-disposable.svg)](http://hits.dwyl.io/lxsmnsyc/rx-disposable)

| Platform | Build Status |
| --- | --- |
| Linux | [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable) |
| Windows | [![Build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/mkjwe462uk80axx4?svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable) |


[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable)
[![Known Vulnerabilities](https://snyk.io/test/github/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable/badge.svg?targetFile=package.json)](https://snyk.io/test/github/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable?targetFile=package.json)

## Install

NPM

```bash
npm i rx-disposable
```

CDN

* jsDelivr
```html
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/rx-disposable/dist/index.min.js"></script>
```

* unpkg
```html
<script src="https://unpkg.com/rx-disposable/dist/index.min.js"></script>
```

## Usage

### Loading the module

#### CommonJS

```js
const Disposable = require('rx-disposable');
```

Loading the CommonJS module provides the Disposable class.

#### Browser

Loading the JavaScript file for the rx-disposable provides the Disposable class

## Documentation

You can read the documentation at the [official doc site](https://lxsmnsyc.github.io/rx-disposable/)

## Build

Clone the repo first, then run the following to install the dependencies

```bash
npm install
```

To build the coverages, run the test suite, the docs, and the distributable modules:

```bash
npm run build
```
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "rx-disposable",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "Reactive Extensions - represents the state of disposition",
  "main": "index.js",
  "directories": {
    "test": "test"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "linux-mocha": "./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require @babel/register -R spec --recursive",
    "linux-test": "./node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter=html npm run linux-mocha",
    "linux-docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "linux-cjs": "./node_modules/.bin/rollup src/index.js --format cjs --name \"Disposable\" --file index.js",
    "linux-browser": "./node_modules/.bin/rollup src/index.js --format iife --name \"Disposable\" --file dist/index.js",
    "linux-minify": "npm run linux-browser && ./node_modules/.bin/terser dist/index.js --compress --mangle --output dist/index.min.js",
    "linux-build": "npm run linux-cjs && npm run linux-minify && npm run linux-docs && npm run linux-test",
    "win-mocha": "node node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --require @babel/register -R spec --recursive",
    "win-test": "node node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=html npm run win-mocha",
    "win-docs": "node node_modules/esdoc/out/src/ESDocCLI.js",
    "win-cjs": "node node_modules/.bin/rollup src/index.js --format cjs --name \"Disposable\" --file index.js",
    "win-browser": "node node_modules/.bin/rollup src/index.js --format iife --name \"Disposable\" --file dist/index.js",
    "win-minify": "npm run win-browser && node node_modules/.bin/terser dist/index.js --compress --mangle --output dist/index.min.js",
    "win-build": "npm run win-cjs && npm run win-minify && npm run win-docs && npm run win-test",
    "mocha": "npm run linux-mocha || npm run win-mocha",
    "test": "npm run linux-test || npm run win-test",
    "docs": "npm run linux-docs || npm run win-docs",
    "cjs": "npm run linux-cjs || npm run win-cjs",
    "browser": "npm run linux-browser || npm run win-browser",
    "minify": "npm run linux-minify || npm run win-minify",
    "build": "npm run cjs && npm run minify && npm run docs && npm test"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "rx",
    "rxjs",
    "reactive-extensions",
    "disposable"
  ],
  "author": "LXSMNSYC (alexis.munsayac@gmail.com)",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/LXSMNSYC/rx-disposable#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.4.3",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.4.3",
    "@babel/register": "^7.4.0",
    "acorn": "^6.1.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-integrate-test-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.16.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^13.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.16.0",
    "mocha": "^6.1.2",
    "nyc": "^13.3.0",
    "rollup": "^1.9.3",
    "terser": "^3.17.0"
  }
}

description: should return false if Disposable has been disposed before.

description: #enable

description: should return true if Disposable is enabled after being disabled.

name: it17

name: it20

name: it25
description: should return false if the Disposable parent is already disposed.

description: should the children be disposed if the parent is disposed

name: it27

name: describe28

description: should return false if the Disposable given is not the child.

name: it30

name: it31

description: should fire the disable listener if the Disposable is disabled

name: describe37
description: #removeEventListener

name: it38
description: should not fire the enable listener if the Disposable is enabled

name: it39
description: should not fire the disable listener if the Disposable is disabled

name: it40
description: should not fire the dispose listener if the Disposable is disposed
